column4: Hello, can someone help me? I just  installed linux last night and I finnaly got it running good  with no errors, but I cannot download anything from the software  centre, I see install but when I click it nothing happens.
and yes I was having tons of issues using apt-get update/upgrade but I finnaly got everything to update and install without any errors
1) why are you root?  2) why are you IRCing with the root account? - not a good idea.
